sourcesContent: import React,{useState} from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import {Menu,Input,Row,Col,Badge, Affix, Button} from 'antd' import { NotificationOutlined} from '@ant-design/icons'; import { MdDirectionsBike } from 'react-icons/md'; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' function AppLayout({children}) { const [top, setTop] = useState(0); return ( setTop(top )} mode="horizontal" style={{backgroundColor:'#4B87FF'}}> 대쉬보드 라이딩경로 테스트 ) } export default AppLayout
